title: #100DaysOfCode day 9
body:
## Progress

Worked on a few more additions for this website:

* Added a `Category` collection to the Netlify CMS configuration
* Introduced a getter to the store for blog posts. It prioritizes articles and pushes log entries like this one to the back of the list

## Links

* Found this handy VS Code extension that sorts Tailwind CSS classes (<https://github.com/heybourn/headwind>)
description: Fun fact: In the Rich Text Format specification, 9 is the language code for the English language
